sentences.sContent: The blue rectangle represents a screen, and as you can see from the emptiness around it, it is currently all alone.
sentences.sContent_eng: The blue rectangle represents a screen, and as you can see from the emptiness around it, it is currently all alone.
sentences.sCn: 蓝色的矩形代表着一个屏幕，你可以从它周围的空无一物看到，当前它是独立的。

sentences.sContent: I figured something drastic must have happened in his life, as it is very unusual for a hound to be traveling all alone.
sentences.sContent_eng: I figured something drastic must have happened in his life, as it is very unusual for a hound to be traveling all alone.
sentences.sCn: 总独自游荡对一只猎犬来说非常不同寻常，我料想它生活里一定是发生过什么大波折。
